HomePage.metadataDescription: Helldiver.help is an assistant site for each Helldiver who fights to ensure democracy, freedom and prosperity throughout the galaxy.
HomePage.pageDescription: Welcome to the Helldivers 2 Manual! Get ready to plunge into the exciting world of global war with hostile invaders: Automatons and Terminids. In this manual you will find all the necessary information to make it easier to navigate the features of your equipment, enemies and planets of the galaxy and emerge victorious from all the missions you complete.

ResourcesPage.pageDescription: Resources are the fuel to increase your personal effectiveness in the struggle to promote managed democracy, freedom and prosperity throughout the galaxy.

ProgressionPage.pageDescription: When you go into battle, remember that your courage and dedication will be noticed. Thanks to your diligence and dedication to the cause of the Super Earth, you will receive promotions and honorary titles for your heroic deeds in promoting a managed democracy.
ProgressionPage.pageAdditionalDescription: Starting with the Cadet title, you need to demonstrate your loyalty by proving yourself on the battlefield as a true defender of democracy. Each title you receive reflects your desire for greatness through feats, bravery and skill. May your name become a symbol of the power that will shake the galaxy!

AchievementsPage.pageDescription: To encourage each Helldiver, the Super-Earth leadership has developed a list of achievements for which you will receive honor and respect from every citizen of a free and democratic galaxy.

PlayerCardsPage.metadataDescription: Each Helldiver can add a touch of personality by choosing one of the player's unique cards. They will better highlight your armor and you among the comrades.
PlayerCardsPage.pageDescription: Each Helldiver can add a touch of personality by choosing one of the player's unique cards. They will better highlight your armor and you among the comrades.

EmotesPage.pageDescription: During the battles, any Helldiver accumulates a certain share of impressions or experiences. They can be easily thrown out in emotions! You can celebrate the victory and successful return with a beautiful victory pose. Show everyone your muscles or hug your beloved comrade, the main thing is to keep your mind for the further continuation of the spread of democracy throughout the galaxy.

Achievements.5Title: They Don't Call It Tacticool For Nothin'
Achievements.19Title: That Which Does Not Kill You...
Achievements.20Title: Democracy Ain't Done With You Yet
Achievements.23Title: It's The Only Way To Be Sure...
Achievements.27Title: Samples Are A Diver's Best Friend
Achievements.32Title: Hold My Primary, I'm Going In!
Achievements.2Description: Customize your Helldiver with new cape, armor, and helmet.
Achievements.6Description: Extract from a mission during nighttime.
Achievements.8Description: Kill 150 enemies during the same mission.
Achievements.9Description: Complete a mission but fail to extract.
Achievements.10Description: Extract after the timer reaches zero.
Achievements.11Description: Kill a target at a distance of over 100m.
Achievements.12Description: Fly at least 25 meters from the shockwave of an explosion.
Achievements.15Description: Kill a bug warrior with a shotgun within 1 meter.
Achievements.16Description: Complete a Stalker Hive tactical objective.
Achievements.18Description: Fire at least 150 rounds in one burst, killing at least 10 enemies.
Achievements.19Description: Be injured in all limbs at the same time.
Achievements.21Description: Provide assisted reload for a teammate.
Achievements.22Description: Extract with a full team on Hard difficulty or more mission.
Achievements.23Description: Have 6 orbital barrage stratagems in the same place at the same time.
Achievements.25Description: Kill 100 enemies using fire damage during the same mission.
Achievements.26Description: Extract with at least 15 common samples.
Achievements.27Description: Extract with at least 15 rare samples from a mission as a team.
Achievements.28Description: While using a jump pack, knock yourself into a ragdoll state.
Achievements.29Description: Shoot off both arms on a Hulk and then extract while it's alive.
Achievements.30Description: Kill a Charger with a resupply pod.
Achievements.31Description: Complete an Extreme difficulty mission or higher without anyone dying.
Achievements.32Description: Complete a full Hard difficulty mission or higher without anyone firing their primary or support weapon.
Achievements.33Description: Complete a full Extreme difficulty Blitz mission and extract in under 6 minutes.
Achievements.37Description: Reach max rank on one ship module.
Achievements.38Description: Upgrade all ship modules at least 1 level.
Achievements.2AccomplishmentWay: Use the arsenal and equip your Helldiver. Let your friends get jealous.
Achievements.3AccomplishmentWay: Complete 1 task against Terminids. Death to the bugs!
Achievements.4AccomplishmentWay: Complete 1 task against Automatons. Way to go, John Connor!
Achievements.5AccomplishmentWay: Just complete 10 tactical objectives. Show your enemies what democracy is!
Achievements.6AccomplishmentWay: Finish any mission on the night side of the planet.
Achievements.7AccomplishmentWay: Play any mission on the planet that is currently under attack by one of the factions.
Achievements.8AccomplishmentWay: Complete any task starting from 3 or 4 difficulty.
Achievements.9AccomplishmentWay: Complete the task, but do not evacuate (spend all the reinforce stratagems). Don't worry, you're not the first, you're not the last.
Achievements.10AccomplishmentWay: Just evacuate after the time runs out. A good time reference point would be the lack of the ability to call any stratagems.
Achievements.11AccomplishmentWay: Kill the enemy from a long distance, you can use a weapon with an optical sight.
Achievements.12AccomplishmentWay: Call the orbital stratagem or the Eagle stratagem while standing on some high ground.
Achievements.13AccomplishmentWay: Start a 4+ difficulty mission and kill him. You can use the ventilation hole in the back or just call the stratagem.
Achievements.14AccomplishmentWay: The Bile Titan appears as a constant enemy starting from the 6th difficulty. Use powerful stratagems and the entire arsenal. That still only counts as one!
Achievements.15AccomplishmentWay: Let the terminid warrior get closer and fire the whole clip at it. You are the most important warrior here!
Achievements.16AccomplishmentWay: Blow up the nest of stalkers. You can use a grenade, a stratagem, a grenade launcher or an autocannon.
Achievements.17AccomplishmentWay: Just throw the grenade at your feet, and then throw it away.
Achievements.18AccomplishmentWay: Take a machine gun stratagem and apply it on a group of enemies. The main thing is not to take your finger off the trigger, you're not a traitor, are you?
Achievements.19AccomplishmentWay: Equip the armor with the property «Democracy protects» and try to explode. Maybe it won't work on the 1st attempt, but Helldivers never die!
Achievements.20AccomplishmentWay: Go to the wounded ally, point at it and press the «E» key. Helldivers never die!
Achievements.21AccomplishmentWay: Your partner should use an autocannon/recoilless rifle/spear, take his backpack with spare shells and help him load the weapon. The strength is in friendship!
Achievements.22AccomplishmentWay: Follow the advice «Don't die» and the achievement will be received.
Achievements.23AccomplishmentWay: Take your teammates and use the orbital stratagems at 1 point. I advise you to take 120 and 380 mm, as they will give you more time to use everything.
Achievements.24AccomplishmentWay: Complete a task of 5+ difficulty, select a stratagem with a large damage area and challenge it to a group of enemies. I advise you to do this near nests/factories.
Achievements.25AccomplishmentWay: Use incendiary weapons, as well as napalm airstrike. I advise you to complete the task against the Terminids. How about a bug BBQ?
Achievements.26AccomplishmentWay: Any of your friends should evacuate with 15 ordinary samples in their pockets. The main thing is that 1 Helldiver should have this amount.
Achievements.27AccomplishmentWay: Just go to the mission with a higher difficulty level, as there will be more samples.
Achievements.28AccomplishmentWay: Throw a grenade at your feet and use a jumppack before it explodes.
Achievements.29AccomplishmentWay: A Hulk is starting to appear from difficulty 4, just shoot off his hands with a railgun and warn your comrades, then evacuate.
Achievements.30AccomplishmentWay: Deal a lot of damage to the Charger, then stun him (EMP kick or bang his head against the wall) and call a stratagem.
Achievements.31AccomplishmentWay: Do this in short missions against Terminids. Don't forget about the steams, fighter!
Achievements.32AccomplishmentWay: Forget about the 1st and 3rd keys, take a lot of attacking stratagems and choose a quick mission. May democracy help you!
Achievements.33AccomplishmentWay: Grab your comrades, equip yourself with light armor, a jumppack, and also take explosive weapons. Don't forget to leave someone in the evacuation zone for a faster escape from the planet.
Achievements.34AccomplishmentWay: 5,000 Enemies? Super Earth is proud of you!
Achievements.35AccomplishmentWay: Each mission brings the victory of a managed democracy closer!
Achievements.36AccomplishmentWay: A monument should be erected in your honor!
Achievements.37AccomplishmentWay: To get an achievement, you will need: 10 super samples, 160-200 common samples, 100-120 rare samples.
Achievements.38AccomplishmentWay: It will take 400 common samples to achieve the achievement.
Achievements.39AccomplishmentWay: Helldiver, you're a legend! You can walk through the bars of Super Earth with your head held high.

PlayerCards.4Name: The Cape of Stars and Suffrage

Resources.2Difficulties: Starting from the 4th level of difficulty
Resources.3Difficulties: Starting from the 6th level of difficulty
Resources.1ObtainingMethod: Points of interest, outposts of Terminids and Automatons
Resources.2ObtainingMethod: Points of interest, outposts of Terminids and Automatons, also in the wild, in the shape of a flower
Resources.3ObtainingMethod: Point of interest with a high stone
Resources.4ObtainingMethod: Buying in-game store or points of interest
Resources.5ObtainingMethod: Completing missions, points of interest, completing major and personal orders from Super Earth
Resources.6ObtainingMethod: Completing missions, successful evacuation from the mission, points of interest
Resources.4ApplicationScope: Purchase items from the Super Store or purchase of a warbond
Resources.5ApplicationScope: Purchase of the contents of a warbond
Resources.superCreditsMaxAmount: It depends on the size of your wallet or your time

data.warbonds: ["HELLDIVERS MOBILIZE!", "STEELED VETERANS", "CUTTING EDGE", "DEMOCRATIC DETONATION", "POLAR PATRIOTS", "VIPER COMMANDOS", "FREEDOM'S FLAME", "CHEMICAL AGENTS", "TRUTH ENFORCERS"]
